🌟 **Welcome to Zer0 Customer Solutions!**

**Our Mission:** Zer0's unwavering dedication to excellence in service delivery. Whether assisting with a simple inquiry or managing complex product challenges, Zer0 Customer Solutions strives to exceed expectations at every opportunity, reinforcing our reputation as a trusted partner in customer satisfaction and support.

**What We Offer:**
Zer0 provides full-spectrum customer care services similar to HP customer support, including technical help, repairs, warranty claims, billing inquiries, product setup guidance, and general assistance.

**Support Channels:**
• Web Chat
• Phone
• Email
• Whatsapp

**Additional Services:**
• Quarterly webinars and live Q&A sessions with product specialists and service managers providing Product updates, maintenance tips, and upcoming releases
• Rewards customers who recommend Zer0 products and services
• Focus on Building community and trust around our brand

Available 9 AM–9 PM IST, seven days a week with emergency escalations outside these hours are handled on request! 😊

⏱️ **Zer0 Customer Care Response Times:**

• **Common inquiries answered immediately** - That's me, Prashna! 😊
• **Live human agent call within 1 hour, or ETA provided**
• **Email responses:** Within 4 hours
• **Full resolution:** Within 24 hours
• **Emergency escalations:** Live agents may call back within 30 minutes when required

We're available 9 AM–9 PM IST, seven days a week, with emergency escalations outside these hours are handled on request.

Our commitment to excellence means we strive to exceed these expectations whenever possible! 🌟
What would you like to know more about?

📋 **Tracking Your Zer0 Support Request:**

1. **Ticket ID:** You'll receive a unique ticket ID (e.g., ZER0-2025-001) when you submit
2. **Email Updates:** Automatic notifications within 4 hours
3. **Prashna Chat:** Ask me anytime to check your status - I have instant access! 💬
4. **Multi-Channel Support:** Updates via web chat, phone, email, WhatsApp
5. **Seamless Transfers:** Seamless transfer to live agents with preserved chat history - no need to repeat yourself!

Your ticket stages: Registered → Expert Assigned → In Progress → Resolved ✅

I can help you check your status right now if you have a ticket ID! 😊

📝 **Information for Zer0 Support:**

**Required Information:**
• Your full name
• Valid email address
• Issue category from our support scope:
  - • Troubleshooting device issues
• Warranty repairs and replacements
• Software setup and updates
• Billing or account questions
• Shipping, returns, or exchange requests
• Detailed description of your concern

**Helpful for Faster Resolution:**
• Device model and serial number
• Error messages or screenshots
• Troubleshooting steps you've already tried
• Purchase date and warranty status
• Account or order number
